headline: FLUKE HANDHELD AIRBORNE PARTICLE COUNTER
specstable:
Manufacturer Fluke
Model 983
Maximum Number of Channels 6
Channel Sizes 0.3, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0, 5.0, 10.0 µm
Light Source Laser Diode
Accessories Zero Count Filter
Zero Count Filter Adapter
Isokinetic Probe w/ Barb
RJ-45 to DB-9 Connector
Rs-232 Modular Cable
1/4 in. High Purity Tubing (2 ft.)
FlukeView Forms Documenting Software CD
AC Adapter/Charger
Other Information

Sample and Hold Times:
1.0L (21 seconds)
2.83L (60 seconds)
10.0L (3.53 minutes)
28.3L (10 minutes)
0.01CF (6 seconds)
0.1CF (60 seconds)
1.0CF (10 minutes)
Manual (countinuously samples until stopped).
Count Modes: Concentration, Totalize, Audio
Counting Efficency: 50% @0.3 µm; 100% for particles > 0.45 µm (per JIS B9921:1997)
Zero Count: 1 count/5 minute (JIS B9921:1997)
Flow Rate: 0.1 cfm (2.83 L/min) controlled by internal pump
Interface: RS-232 and RS-485 via RJ-45
Power Requirements: AC Adapter, 12 VDC at 2.5 A, 90 to 250 VAC, 50 to 60 Hz

CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 4.500 in (11.4 cm)
Depth 8.250 in (21.0 cm)
Height 2.250 in (5.7 cm)
Weight 2 lb (1 kg)
